error.message: Return type of method Drupal\sqlsrv\Driver\Database\sqlsrv\Connection::prepareStatement() has typehint with deprecated class Drupal\Core\Database\Statement. Deprecated in drupal:9.1.0 and is removed from drupal:10.0.0. Database drivers should use or extend StatementWrapper instead, and encapsulate client-level statement objects.

Return type of method Drupal\sqlsrv\Driver\Database\sqlsrv\Connection::query() has typehint with deprecated class Drupal\Core\Database\Statement. Deprecated in drupal:9.1.0 and is removed from drupal:10.0.0. Database drivers should use or extend StatementWrapper instead, and encapsulate client-level statement objects.
Fetching deprecated class constant RETURN_STATEMENT of class Drupal\Core\Database\Database. Deprecated in drupal:9.4.0 and is removed from drupal:11.0.0. There is no replacement.

Fetching deprecated class constant RETURN_NULL of class Drupal\Core\Database\Database. Deprecated in drupal:9.4.0 and is removed from drupal:11.0.0. There is no replacement.

Value of core_version_requirement: ^9.2 is not compatible with the next major version of Drupal core. See https://drupal.org/node/3070687.
The drupal/core requirement is not compatible with the next major version of Drupal. Either remove it or update it to be compatible. See https://drupal.org/node/2514612#s-drupal-9-compatibility.
